hero.headline: Charless Netumbare | Muenzanisi WeFull-Stack Uye Mucheki weTechnology
hero.subline: Ndiri kuita zvinhu zvakakosheswa zveFintec, ndichicheka robotics, uye ndichikwanisa kuunganidza simba renyama nezvakasarudzika zvedigital. Ndiri muHarare, Africa.

about.title: Nezve Mwene
about.intro: Ndini muenzanisi weFull-Stack ane makore 21 uye munhu weBaskeball (1.9m) anobva muHarare, Africa. Ndinotenda kushanda zvakakwana, kudzidza zvakakurumidza, uye kuisa simbaâ€”kana zvichiri kuita zvinhu zveFull-stack kana kumidzana 10km.

questbook.title: Siya Nhau
questbook.description: Rangarira pfungwa dzako uye siya nhau kune mwene
questbook.thankYou: Waita zvakanaka! Nhau yako yakatumirwa. Ndichakubvunzaira gore.
